metadata.title: CVE-2014-2570 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in www/make_subset.php in PHP Font Lib before 0.3.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the name parameter.

criterions.comment: php-font-lib package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
